com.tutego.jrtf

Class RtfDocfmt

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tutego.jrtf.RtfDocfmt

  • public class RtfDocfmt
extends java.lang.Object
    Instances represent document format like page width, margins.

      • defaultTab

        public static RtfDocfmt defaultTab(double width,
                   RtfUnit unit)
        Default tab width. If not set the default is 720 twips.
        Parameters:
        width - Width of the tab.
        unit - Unit of the tab.
        Returns:
        New RtfDocfmt object.

      • hyphenationHotZone

        public static RtfDocfmt hyphenationHotZone(double width,
                           RtfUnit unit)
        Hyphenation hot zone.
        Parameters:
        width - Amount of space at the right margin in which words are hyphenated.
        unit - Unit of the tab.
        Returns:
        New RtfDocfmt object.
